description: canal on L with a number of boats parked along the banks; a row of houses lines the right side of the canal; a human figure at center walks away from a boat towards a house under a line of colorful hanging laundry
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
